title: 510K CPUs, HDDs & more seized as smugglers keep trying to sneak tech into China
description: A stuffed silicone stomach and other extreme smuggling attempts thwarted.

title: 3CX knew its app was flagged as malicious, but took no action for 7 days
description: "It's not exactly our place to comment on it," 3CX rep says of malicious detection.

title: The long-rumored Starfleet Academy TV series will finally get made
description: The show will be led by a writer known for Nancy Drew and The Magicians.

title: Yes, Virginia, there is AI joy in seeing fake Will Smith ravenously eat spaghetti
description: Open source "text2video" ModelScope AI made the viral sensation possible.

title: Google Assistant might be doomed: Division “reorganizes” to focus on Bard
description: The Google Assistant makes no money and hasn't released hardware in two years.

title: Brightest-ever gamma ray burst (the “BOAT”) continues to puzzle astronomers
description: No evidence of associated supernova, and afterglow radio data contradicts current models.

title: GPT-4 poses too many risks and releases should be halted, AI group tells FTC
description: OpenAI released GPT-4 despite "full knowledge" of risks, nonprofit tells agency.

title: Marburg outbreak grows with concerning geographic spread in Equatorial Guinea
description: WHO said Equatorial Guinea is not reporting some confirmed cases, delaying responses.

title: Meta wants EU users to apply for permission to opt out of data collection
description: Instead of a yes/no consent, Meta users will fill out a form and include justification.

title: Trojanized Windows and Mac apps rain down on 3CX users in massive supply chain attack
description: Remember SolarWinds? A similar attack is playing out now against a new software supplier.

title: Apple TV’s Tetris biopic loses the true plot amid its ‘80s movie tropes
description: The game's amazing backstory deserves better than these Cold War movie cliches.

title: How a major toy company kept 4chan online
description: Good Smile, which licenses toy production for Disney, was a major investor in 4chan.

title: Manchin vows to sue Biden administration over EV tax credits
description: The senator doesn't think making powders or wafers counts as "processing."

title: Pro-Russian hackers target elected US officials supporting Ukraine
description: Group tracked since 2021 exploits unpatched Zimbra servers to hack email accounts.

title: My quest to re-create Street Fighter’s long-lost pneumatic controls
description: True fighting gamers land harder hits by slamming their fists on huge "bash pads."
